title: 고급 담화 표지 ②
description: albeit, notwithstanding, inasmuch as 등 매우 고급스러운 담화 표지를 사용하여 복잡한 논리 관계를 정교하게 표현하는 연습.
examples: The project succeeded, albeit with some delays.
Inasmuch as resources are limited, we must prioritize.
learning_points: 매우 고급스러운 담화 표지를 통한 정교한 논리 관계 표현

sentences.kr: 비록 약간의 지연이 있었지만, 프로젝트는 성공했습니다.
sentences.en: The project succeeded, albeit with some delays.

sentences.kr: 자원이 제한되어 있는 만큼, 우선순위를 정해야 합니다.
sentences.en: Inasmuch as resources are limited, we must prioritize.
The results are satisfactory, albeit not perfect.

sentences.kr: 반대 의견이 있음에도 불구하고, 결정을 내렸습니다.
sentences.en: Notwithstanding opposing views, a decision was made.
Inasmuch as time is short, efficiency is crucial.
Progress was made, albeit in small steps.
Notwithstanding budget constraints, we achieved our goals.
